title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct market research, gather user feedback, and analyze existing documentation tools. Identify target audience, use cases, and key features. Determine technology stack and integration requirements. Establish project timeline, milestones, and resource allocation. This task may also involve creating a comprehensive project plan, documentation, and specifications for each identified feature. Once the planning phase is complete, the task will be decomposed into smaller tasks for further implementation. Include competitive analysis to understand market landscape and positioning. Furthermore, it's recommended to conduct a SWOT (Strengths, Weaknesses, Opportunities, Threats) analysis to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project context. Suggestions: Add a section for risk management and mitigation strategies, and consider involving the UX/UI designer early in the process to ensure user-friendly design.

title: Architecture Design
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, database, and infrastructure components.

title: User Interface Design
description: Design the user interface and user experience for creating, viewing, and interacting with the interactive documentation.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend components, including APIs, content management system, and integration with multimedia assets.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store documentation content, user data, and multimedia assets.

title: Infrastructure and DevOps
description: Set up the infrastructure, including servers, networking, and continuous integration/deployment pipelines.

title: Security and Compliance
description: Implement security measures, such as authentication, authorization, and data encryption, and ensure compliance with relevant regulations.

title: Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for the platform, including tutorials and best practices.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop and implement a comprehensive testing strategy, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing.

title: Deployment and Launch
description: Deploy the platform to production environments, perform final testing, and launch the platform to users.
